author: fitz
msg: * doc/book/book/ch02.xml: Tweak comment, fix busted emacs local variables.

author: brane
msg: default contents of the ~/.subversion/config file to show the actual
default values of diff_cmd and diff3_cmd, and add a new option,
* subversion/libsvn_subr/io.c (svn_io_run_diff): Read the name of the
diff command from the config file.
(svn_io_run_diff3): Same here for diff, diff3 and whether diff3 accepts
the --diff-program option. Use an autoincrementing index to populate the
diff3 argument list, like in svn_io_run_diff.
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: philip
msg: Rename configuration file, and registry key, from "proxies" to "servers"
as it now contains more than proxy information.
Note: old "proxies" settings must be copied to "servers" to be
available to the new client.  The old "proxies" settings are no
longer used, they need to be retained only if old clients are in
